meanings.definition: A person who is regarded as silly or lacking intelligence.
meanings.sent1: The featherbrain in the class always tells jokes.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to him, he's just a featherbrain.
meanings.sent3: The featherbrain thought the moon was made of cheese!
meanings.sent4: Her brother is a featherbrain, believing in talking animals.
meanings.sent5: The featherbrain's forgetfulness was legendary among his friends.

meanings.definition: To call someone a featherbrain is to insult their intelligence.
meanings.sent1: Please don't featherbrain me just because I made a mistake.
meanings.sent2: She likes to featherbrain her brother whenever he forgets his keys.

meanings.sent4: The teacher didn't mean to featherbrain the student with her comment.
meanings.sent5: It's not nice to featherbrain others just because they don't know something.
